external_games.name: Codemasters 2 in 1: Fantastic Dizzy + Cosmic Spacehead

name: Codemasters 2 in 1: Fantastic Dizzy + Cosmic Spacehead
summary: Codemasters 2 in 1 is a compilation of two classic titles released on the console on a single cartridge: Fantastic Dizzy and Cosmic Spacehead AKA Linus Spacehead's Cosmic Capers.
